description:
Medical Terminology for Beginners course is for absolute beginners to medical terminology and is suitable for anyone wanting to enter medical administration / secretarial work in the public or private sector. The course contains one module covering the basics of how a medical term is formed (prefixes, suffixes and root words) and leads gently on to more complex terms. Learning incorporates a number of self-assessment opportunities and a final assessment.

I hope you find this course useful in your daily life you all now know what your doctor tells you when you visit the hospital
title: Medical Terminology for beginners
